title: Append event observations — add_event_observation
code: add_event_observation(   nif,   sdtm,   domain,   event_filter,   testcd = NULL,   event_diff = FALSE,   analyte = NULL,   parent = NULL,   metabolite = FALSE,   cmt = NULL,   subject_filter = "!ACTARMCD %in% c('SCRNFAIL', 'SCREENFAIL', 'NOTTRT')",   observation_filter = "TRUE",   dtc_field = NULL,   keep = NULL,   debug = FALSE,   silent = NULL )

title: Append event observations — add_event_observation
text: nif nif object. sdtm sdtm object. domain domain code character. event_filter filter term characterize events extract, character. testcd testcode xxTESTCD xx domain code, character. used NULL. event_diff retain events change event filter evaluating TRUE FALSE previous observation, .e., apply time differentiation observation. logical. Defaults FALSE. analyte name analyte. Defaults 'EV_testcd', NULL. parent name parent analyte observation character. Defaults value 'analyte' NULL. metabolite observation metabolite, logical. cmt compartment observation, numeric. subject_filter filter applied DM domain, character. observation_filter filtering apply observation source data, character. dtc_field field use date-time code observation. Defaults 'xxDTC', xx domain name, NULL. keep Columns keep, character. debug Add debug information, logical. silent Suppress messages, logical. Defaults nif_option setting NULL.

title: Kaplan-Meier plot for events — kmplot
code: kmplot(   nif,   analyte,   dose = NULL,   group = NULL,   convert_tafd_h_to_d = TRUE,   title = NULL,   y_label = NULL,   show_censoring = TRUE,   show_risk_table = TRUE,   show_ci = TRUE,   silent = NULL )

title: Kaplan-Meier plot for events — kmplot
text: nif nif object. analyte analyte. dose dose, defaults doses, NULL. group Grouping variable. convert_tafd_h_to_d Convert TAFD field hours days, defaults TRUE. title plot title, defaults none NULL. y_label y axis label, defaults analyte, NULL. show_censoring Add censor mark, logical. show_risk_table Add risk table, logical. show_ci Add confidence interval, logical. silent Suppress messages, logical. Defaults nif_option setting NULL.

title: Make event observation — make_event
code: make_event(   sdtm,   domain,   event_filter = "TRUE",   testcd = NULL,   event_diff = FALSE,   analyte = NULL,   parent = NULL,   metabolite = FALSE,   cmt = NULL,   subject_filter = "!ACTARMCD %in% c('SCRNFAIL', 'SCREENFAIL', 'NOTTRT')",   observation_filter = "TRUE",   dtc_field = NULL,   keep = NULL,   silent = NULL )

title: Make event observation — make_event
text: sdtm sdtm object. domain domain code character. event_filter filter term characterize events extract, character. testcd testcode xxTESTCD xx domain code, character. used NULL. event_diff retain events change event filter evaluating TRUE FALSE previous observation, .e., apply time differentiation observation. logical. Defaults FALSE. analyte name analyte. Defaults 'EV_testcd', NULL. parent name parent analyte observation character. Defaults value 'analyte' NULL. metabolite observation metabolite, logical. cmt compartment observation, numeric. subject_filter filter applied DM domain, character. observation_filter filtering apply observation source data, character. dtc_field field use date-time code observation. Defaults 'xxDTC', xx domain name, NULL. keep Columns keep, character. silent Suppress messages, logical. Defaults nif_option setting NULL.
